## Installation

You can install the development version from Github with:

```{r, eval=FALSE, echo=TRUE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("willju-wangqian/ggpaintr")
```

## Run the shiny app

```{r, eval=FALSE, echo=TRUE}
library(ggpaintr)

run_ggpaintr_app()
```
